Posts.Content: i too have implants..behing the muscle..i found a lump 5 months ago in the same area as you..it was about helf the size of a marble and it moved around a little and was a little tender too..i had a mammogram and an ultrasound and it is just a fatty tumor..i had never heard of such a thing..i had the choice of leaving it or having it removed..out patient..i left it alone but may have it taken out at a later date..just do what your dr. tells you, have it checked out and try not to be alarmed..every bump does not mean breast cancer..best of luck to you
Posts.Title: new lump, scared, suggestions please...
